means: 无依无靠的，失去产业的，被逐出的
剥夺( dispossess的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Droves of dispossessed people emigrated to Canada.
sentence.Network_cn: 一批批流离失所的人们移民到了加拿大。

sentence.Network_en: The tenant was dispossessed for not paying his rent.
sentence.Network_cn: 那名房客因未付房租而被赶走.

sentence.Network_en: They have dispossessed him of his political rights.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们剥夺了他的政治权力.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Like many of his later novels, its central theme is the hardship faced by the dispossessed(无依无靠的) and those of the outside of society. Olive.
disposition of property 产权处置dispossessed 被逼迁dissolution feature [rock] 岩溶现象〔岩石〕.
...dispose of 清除处置dispossess 夺取剥夺掠夺霸占dispossessed 被剥夺者dispossession
talk of a new architecture for the international system does not quell the anger of the dispossessed and unemployed .对构建新国际体系的讨论无法平息失去房屋和工作的人的愤怒。

list.abs: They dispossessed me of my land ., 他们霸占了我的土地.
the urban poor , too , came originally from dispossessed peasants .城市贫民本来也是来源于破产的农民。
if you pay your rent , they can't dispossess you .如果你付租金，他们就不能剥夺你的权利。
雨果奖 - 维基百科，自由的百科全书 ... 《傻瓜大闹科学城》 Sleeper 《一无所有》 The Dispossessed 《莱安娜之歌》 A Song for Lya.
...发展中不但没有得益，反而被剥削净尽、无依无靠、几乎一无所有的弱势社群(the dispossessed)；还有那个逐渐富起来，于是变得 …

entry.def: If you are dispossessed of something that you own, especially land or buildings, it is taken away from you.

example.ex: ...people who were dispossessed of their land under apartheid...
example.tran: 在种族隔离政策下被剥夺了土地的人们

example.ex: They settled the land, dispossessing many of its original inhabitants...
example.tran: 他们在土地上定居，赶走了许多原来的居民。

means.word_mean: 1. physically or spiritually homeless or deprived of security;

sentences.sentence: "made a living out of shepherding dispossed people from one country to another"- James Stern

auth_sentence.res_content: He was tried, jailed and dispossessed of his property.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was tried, jailed and dispossessed of his property.

auth_sentence.content: No more pestering from M's dispossessed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No more pestering from M's dispossessed.

auth_sentence.content: A veteran, dispossessed of all his belongings, returning from the wars.
auth_sentence.res_content: A veteran, dispossessed of all his belongings, returning from the wars.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A veteran, dispossessed of all his belongings, returning from the wars.
